title: DoorDash will offer financial assistance to delivery workers diagnosed with COVID   or quarantined
description: Food delivery startup DoorDash  which also runs operations for Caviar  has announced its plans to provide financial assistance to delivery workers who are diagnosed with COVID   or quarantined  DoorDash workers in the U S  Australia and Canada are eligible
